item.title: EnCharge AI 融资逾 1 亿美元，将人工智能推理芯片推向市场
item.description: EnCharge AI 初创公司周四表示，该公司在老虎环球（Tiger Global）领投的 B 轮融资中筹集了超过 1 亿美元的资金，用于向市场推出更高效、更便宜的人工智能芯片。【原文：Startup EnCharge AI raised more than $100 million in a Series B funding round led by Tiger Global to bring more efficient and less expensive AI chips to the market, the company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 特朗普希望今年与印度达成公平贸易协议
item.description: 特朗普政府官员在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）与印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）周四举行峰会前表示，特朗普政府希望降低美国对印度的贸易逆差，并希望在2025年与新德里达成公平的双边贸易协议。【原文：The Trump administration wants to bring down the U.S. trade deficit with India and hopes to have a fair bilateral trade deal with New Delhi in place in 2025, Trump administration officials said ahead of a summit between President Donald Trump and Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday.】

item.title: Defiance ETF 为特斯拉和福特配对，未来还有更多对决
item.description: Defiance ETFs 周四推出了一只交易所交易基金（ETF）--Battleshares TSLA vs F ETF，这是看多创新型公司和看空传统行业同类公司的组合基金中的第一只。【原文：Defiance ETFs launched an exchange-traded fund (ETF), the Battleshares TSLA vs F ETF , on Thursday, the first of a group pairing bullish bets on innovative companies with bearish ones on their traditional industry counterparts.】

item.title: Orange 首席执行官力争欧洲卫星主权，保持星链联系
item.description: 法国电信集团 Orange 首席执行官周四表示，该公司正在推动欧洲对卫星的主权，并希望这一生态系统不断壮大，同时继续与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 Starlink 公司合作。【原文：France's Orange is pushing for European sovereignty on satellites and wants that ecosystem to grow in strength, while also continuing to collaborate with Elon Musk's Starlink, the CEO of the telecoms group said on Thursday.】

item.title: 公用事业公司 PPL 因电力需求将资本支出计划提高近 40
item.description: PPL 公司周四将其 2025-2028 年的基础设施投资目标提高到 200 亿美元，比之前的计划增加了近 40%，因为该公司希望强化其电网以抵御风暴，并期望提高电气化程度。【原文：PPL Corp on Thursday boosted its 2025-2028 infrastructure investment target to $20 billion, an increase of nearly 40% from its prior plan, as it looks to harden its grid from storms and expects increased electrification.】

item.title: 美联储很可能按兵不动至 9 月，但交易员增加了对 7 月减息的押注
item.description: 周四，在数据显示1月份批发价格涨幅超过预期且失业救济人数下降之后，交易商们认为美联储将在7月份下调政策利率而不是等到9月份的几率上升，但仍低于均值。 在报告公布前，以联邦基金利率为结算基准的期货合约交易商认为，美联储7月份仍将按目前4.25%-4.5%的政策利率区间按兵不动的几率接近60%；数据公布后，这一几率降至约52%。【原文：Traders on Thursday placed rising but still shy of even odds the Federal Reserve will cut its policy rate in July instead of waiting until September, after data showed wholesale prices rose faster than projected in January and jobless claims declined. Before the reports traders of futures contracts that settle to the federal funds rate priced close to a 60% chance that the Fed would still be on hold in July at the current policy rate range of 4.25%-4.5%; after the data that chance fell to about 52%.】

item.title: VinFast 加快电动汽车交付速度，但在越南境外的销售举步维艰
item.description: 越南电动汽车制造商 VinFast 周四表示，该公司去年交付了约 9.7 万辆汽车，是 2023 年交付量的近三倍，但销售几乎仅限于国内市场。【原文：Vietnamese electric vehicle maker VinFast said on Thursday it delivered about 97,000 cars last year, nearly three times as many as in 2023, but sales were almost exclusively in its domestic market.】

item.title: 德新社报道：保时捷计划到 2029 年裁员约 1900 人
item.description: 据德新社周四报道，德国汽车制造商保时捷公司希望在2029年前裁减约1900个职位。【原文：German carmaker Porsche AG wants to cut around 1,900 positions by 2029, the DPA news agency reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，自由港将于本月恢复从印尼出口铜精矿
item.description: 据两位知情人士透露，自由港麦克默伦公司有望在本月根据新的出口许可证恢复从印尼装运铜精矿，此前的出口许可证已于 12 月失效。【原文：Freeport McMoRan is expected to resume shipments of copper concentrate from Indonesia this month under a new export licence after the previous one lapsed in December, according to two sources with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数下降，劳动力市场稳定
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数有所减少，表明劳动力市场在二月初保持稳定。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits decreased last week, suggesting the labor market remained stable early in February.】

item.title: 美国 1 月份生产者价格涨幅略高于预期
item.description: 1 月份，美国生产者价格稳健增长，为通胀回升提供了更多证据，并增强了金融市场对美联储在下半年之前不会降息的看法。【原文：U.S. producer prices increased solidly in January, offering more evidence inflation was picking up again and strengthening financial market views that the Federal Reserve would not be cutting interest rates before the second half of the year.】

item.title: AEP 第四季度利润增长，原因是数据中心提高了电力需求
item.description: 美国电力公司周四公布第四季度利润增长，原因是数据中心提高了商业客户的电力需求。【原文：U.S. utility American Electric Power posted a rise in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as data centers boosted demand for power from commercial customers.】

item.title: 史蒂文-麦登（Steven Madden）将以 3.6 亿美元收购英国奢侈鞋履品牌 Kurt Geiger
item.description: 鞋履设计师史蒂文-麦登（Steven Madden）周四表示，将以全现金方式收购英国奢侈品牌库尔特-盖格（Kurt Geiger），交易价值为 2.89 亿英镑（约合 3.6009 亿美元），从而扩大其在国际市场上的影响力。【原文：Shoe designer Steven Madden said on Thursday it would buy UK-based luxury brand Kurt Geiger in an all-cash deal valued at 289 million pounds ($360.09 million), expanding its presence in international markets.】

item.title: Datadog 年度营收和利润低于预期，原因是企业支出滞后
item.description: Datadog 周四预测 2025 年收入和利润将低于华尔街预期，原因是经济不确定性导致企业削减预算，客户在其云安全服务上的支出疲软。【原文：Datadog forecast 2025 revenue and profit below Wall Street expectations on Thursday, hurt by sluggish customer spending on its cloud security services as enterprises cut budgets owing to economic uncertainty.】

item.title: BAT 首席执行官表示，希望特朗普政府能打击非法吸食器
item.description: 英美烟草公司首席执行官塔德乌-马洛克（Tadeu Marocco）周四表示，英美烟草公司对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的新政府能够解决美国庞大的非法吸食毒品市场感到乐观。【原文：British American Tobacco is optimistic U.S. President Donald Trump's new administration can tackle a vast market for illegal vapes in the United States, Chief Executive Tadeu Marocco said on Thursday.】

item.title: 在特朗普关税的威胁下，英国与美国出现罕见的商品贸易逆差
item.description: 周四公布的数据显示，英国与美国的货物贸易在去年年底出现了罕见的逆差，伦敦希望这些数据能支持其反对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普征收新关税的立场。【原文：Britain entered a rare deficit in its goods trade with the United States at the end of last year, according to data published on Thursday that London will hope bolsters its case against the imposition of new tariffs by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 需求强劲，穆迪预测全年利润高于预期
item.description: 评级机构穆迪公司（Moody's Corp）周四预测 2025 年的利润将高于华尔街预期，预计在宏观经济不明朗的情况下，市场对其数据和分析产品的需求强劲，这使其股价在盘前交易中上涨了 3% 以上。【原文：Ratings agency Moody's Corp forecast 2025 profit above Wall Street estimates on Thursday, anticipating strong demand for its data and analytics offerings amid macroeconomic ambiguity, sending its shares up over 3% in premarket trading.】

item.title: DTE 能源公司第四季度利润因费率下降而下滑
item.description: DTE 能源公司周四报告称，第四季度利润下降，因为电力价格下降对该公司造成了打击。【原文：DTE Energy reported a fall in fourth-quarter profit on Thursday, as the utility took a hit from lower pricing for electricity.】

item.title: Apptronik 融资 3.5 亿美元，扩大仿人机器人的生产规模
item.description: Apptronik公司周四表示，该公司已在B Capital和Capital Factory领投、Alphabet旗下谷歌参投的一轮融资中筹集到3.5亿美元，用于扩大人工智能人形机器人的生产规模。【原文：Apptronik said on Thursday it has raised $350 million in a funding round led by B Capital and Capital Factory, with participation from Alphabet's Google , to scale production of AI-powered humanoid robots.】

item.title: 通用电气医疗保健公司预计 2025 年利润增长，医疗器械需求稳定
item.description: 通用电气医疗保健技术公司（GE HealthCare Technologies）周四预计全年利润将高于华尔街预期，该公司指望美国等市场对其医疗设备的强劲需求能抵消中国市场的疲软。【原文：GE HealthCare Technologies on Thursday forecast annual profit above Wall Street estimates, counting on strong demand for its medical devices in markets such as the U.S. to offset weakness in China.】

item.title: 因电费上涨，PG&E上调2025年核心盈利预期
item.description: PG&E Corp 周四上调了 2025 年调整后核心盈利预期，原因是该电力公司受益于较低的运营费用和较高的电价。【原文：PG&E Corp on Thursday raised its adjusted core earnings forecast for 2025, as the power company benefits from lower operating expenses and higher electricity rates.】

item.title: 汤森路透将把美国上市地从纽约证券交易所转移到纳斯达克
item.description: 汤森路透（Thomson Reuters）是一家内容和技术公司，该公司周四表示，将把其在美国的股票上市地从纽约证券交易所转移到纳斯达克。【原文：Thomson Reuters , will move its U.S. stock listing to the Nasdaq from the New York Stock Exchange, the content and technology company said on Thursday.】

item.title: 标普全球警告 "前所未有 "的美国世界银行退出风险
item.description: S&P Global公司在顶级信用评级机构名单中名列榜首，警告说美国 "史无前例 "地退出世界银行和其他顶级多边贷款机构将损害其珍贵的三A信用评级。【原文：S&P Global completed the list of top credit rating agencies to warn that an "unprecedented" U.S. withdrawal from the World Bank and other top multilateral lenders would damage their prized triple-A credit ratings.】

item.title: 杜克能源公司因数据中心和工业需求增加而上调五年资本支出计划
item.description: 杜克能源公司（Duke Energy）周四将其五年资本支出计划提高到 830 亿美元，增幅达 13.7%，因为该公司希望加强电网建设，以从即将到来的数据中心需求和电气化增长中获利。【原文：Duke Energy on Thursday raised its five-year capital expenditure plan to $83 billion, a 13.7% jump, as the utility looks to boost its grid to profit from an oncoming demand from data centers and increased electrification.】

item.title: 谷歌失去多年来第二位印度政策主管
item.description: 谷歌公司发言人周四告诉路透社，谷歌印度公共政策主管斯里尼瓦萨-雷迪（Sreenivasa Reddy）已经辞职，这是该公司在印度这一重要市场的关键职位两年来的第二次离职。【原文：Google's head of public policy in India, Sreenivasa Reddy, has quit, a company spokesperson told Reuters on Thursday, marking the second departure in around two years in the critical role in a key market for the company.】

item.title: 特朗普对美国海上风电的敌意波及供应链
item.description: 承诺投资美国海上风电基础设施和供应链的公司正在放弃它们的计划，因为它们原本要服务的项目面临巨大挫折，包括唐纳德-特朗普总统计划终止联邦支持。【原文：Companies that committed to investments in U.S. offshore wind infrastructure and supply chains are scrapping their plans as the projects they were meant to serve face huge setbacks, including President Donald Trump's plan to end federal support.】

item.title: 特朗普称周四将对等征收关税
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他计划在周四公布对等关税，但没有透露其最新关税计划的细节，该计划可能针对所有对美国进口商品征收关税的国家。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said he plans to unveil reciprocal tariffs on Thursday but gave no details about his latest tariff plan, which could take aim at every country that charges duties on U.S. imports.】

item.title: Essilorluxottica 提高智能眼镜产能
item.description: 眼镜制造商依视路（EssilorLuxottica）首席执行官弗朗切斯科-米勒里（Francesco Milleri）周三晚些时候表示，公司计划提高智能眼镜的生产能力，并希望将与 Meta 的合作扩展到其他品牌。【原文：Eyewear maker EssilorLuxottica plans to boost its production capacity for smart glasses and hopes to expand its collaboration with Meta to other brands, Chief Executive Francesco Milleri said late on Wednesday.】

item.title: 利润率下降，PBF 能源公司连续第三个季度亏损
item.description: 周四，PBF 能源公司连续第三个季度出现亏损，原因是该美国炼油厂的利润率下降。【原文：PBF Energy posted a third consecutive quarterly loss on Thursday, as the U.S. refiner took a hit from a decline in margins.】

item.title: 胡桃酱制造商费列罗报告收入增长 8.9
item.description: 榛子酱 Nutella 的生产商费列罗公司周四公布，尽管商品价格波动和通胀压力较大，但在截至 8 月 31 日的财政年度里，公司营业额增长了 8.9%，达到 184 亿欧元（约合 192 亿美元）。【原文：Ferrero, the maker of the Nutella hazelnut spread, reported on Thursday an 8.9% increase in turnover in the financial year ending on August 31, to 18.4 billion euros ($19.2 billion), despite volatile commodity prices and inflationary pressures.】
